#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		int n,m;
		cin>>n>>m;
		if(n==1)
		cout<<"R"<<endl;
		else if(m==1)
		cout<<"D"<<endl;
		else{
			int turns=0;
			if(n==m)
			turns=2*(n-1);
			else if(n>m)
			turns=2*m-1;
			else
			turns= 2*(n-1);
			turns=turns%4;
			if(turns==0)
			cout<<"R"<<endl;
			else if(turns==1)
			cout<<"D"<<endl;
			else if(turns==2)
			cout<<"L"<<endl;
			else
			cout<<"U"<<endl;
		}
	}
	
	
	return 0;
}
